name: Chrome Dev Tools Setup
tagline: This repository contains the information on how to setup the dev tools in Chrome.
body:
# Step 1 - Download sources of example as zip file

[https://github.com/EmbeddedTestingWorkshop/Embedded_FixtureFinder](https://github.com/EmbeddedTestingWorkshop/Embedded_FixtureFinder) 

﻿﻿![Step 1](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_1.png)

# Step 2 - Extract to local folder 

# Step 3 - Open FixtureFinder.html in Chrome

![Step 3](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_3.png)

# Step 4 - Open Chrome Dev Tools 

![Step 4](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_4.png)

# Step 5 - Go to Sources Panel

![Step 5](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_5.png)

# Step 6 - Add locally stored files as a folder to the workspace

![Step 6](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_6.png)

# Step 7 - Allow Chrome to access the local folder

![Step 7](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_7.png)

# Step 8 - Map to File System Resource

*    **Open the directory structure under file://**
*    Select FixtureFinder.html, 
*    Right click, select "Map to File System Resource"

![Step 8](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_8.png)

# Step 9 - Select the FixtureFinder.html file from the folder where you saved the download

![Step 9](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_9.png)

# Step 10 - Restart Dev Tools by clicking “OK”

![Step 10](./images/Setup_Chrome_Dev_Tools_10.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
